name: 2. Dataset Definition, EDA and Preparation Overview
content:
Data Description:

This solution uses public domain dataset for Health Insurance Claims.


The input dataset comprises of following data:


  • Claims Data - Contains info claims id, balance and Diagnosis info
  • Claims Transactions Data - Contains info regarding Encounters, Procedures, Payment Type, Paid Amount etc
  • Providers Data - Contains info regarding Provider Organization with location



Data Preparation:

  • Joining various datasets: Join Claim and Transaction data on claim id then join providers data on provider id then we can use same data for EDA and Clustering then we will use same for modelling


Data Exploration:

  • On claim data we are analysing Amount distribution through box plot
  • Calculate summary statistics on Numerical columns
  • Getting info regarding null values in data frame


Data Quality Assessment:


  • lengths of different ids
  • GENDER Column can contain either M or F
  • The first 5 characters of CLAIMID must be a string
  • initial character of PATIENT_ID must be numeric
  • NAME column should contain only string values
  • TYPE column should contain only string values
